sentences.en: A CBOT floor analyst said corn prices also stimulated spillover support from higher prices.
sentences.cn: 一CBOT场内 分析师称,玉米价格上涨的溢出支撑也刺激了尾盘价格上涨.

sentences.en: But office romances can have a negative spillover effect on co - workers.
sentences.cn: 但是,办公室恋情对其他同事可能有不利的溢出效应.

sentences.en: In the technology transfer of Multi - National Company ( MNC ) , there's externality, which means technology spillover effect.
sentences.cn: 跨国公司 在技术转移中存在着外部性―溢出效应.

sentences.en: In this paper, the parallel filtering control approach to suppress spillover is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出了并行滤波控制方法抑制分布参数结构主动控制中的溢出.

sentences.en: It is very important to measure volatility spillover for the dynamic investment portfolio and risk management.
sentences.cn: 对于动态投资组合与风险管理来说,测度波动的溢出效应是非常重要的.

sentences.en: It'shows technology spillover is not inherent nature for FDI.
sentences.cn: 这种表明FDI的 技术外溢效应不是一种自然属性.

sentences.en: Knowledge spillover in clusters is realized through personnel transfer, enterprises evolution, informal communication, etc.
sentences.cn: 集群内知识溢出主要通过人员流动 、 业衍生 、 正式交流等途径来实现.

sentences.en: Not all of the violence in Miami was spillover from the trial.
sentences.cn: 迈阿密的暴力事件并非全是那次审判引起的。

sentences.en: Other resorts could benefit from the spillover of tourists.
sentences.cn: 其他度假胜地可以从游客带来的影响中间受益.

sentences.en: So is technology spillover with innovation of cluster effect.
sentences.cn: 同时,技术溢出效应也与集群创新效应成正相关.

sentences.en: Some jobs are quite likely to have a negative spillover into family life.
sentences.cn: 有些工作很可能会对家庭生活产生不良影响。

sentences.en: Spillover damage from the building's demolition was confined to some broken glass.
sentences.cn: 拆除这座大楼带来的损失仅仅是一些玻璃被震碎了。

sentences.en: Taking account of such spillover effects greatly increases some banks'value at risk ( see chart 9 ).
sentences.cn: 评估时考虑到这种溢出效应(spillovereffects)8会大幅度增加银行的在险价值图9 ).

sentences.en: The integration increases the R & D investment when the spillover is large enough.
sentences.cn: 当溢出足够大时,一体化后R & D投资增加.

sentences.en: There are opposite effects between the probability of merger and knowledge spillover.
sentences.cn: 而企业间兼并的概率和知识溢出成反比.

sentences.en: These people are subjected to a spillover effect.
sentences.cn: 他们是指那些会受”溢出效应“影响的购物者.

sentences.en: This kind of personnel 'spillover, ' far more than sharing individual technologies, has been key to thriving innovation ecosystems like Silicon Valley.
sentences.cn: 这类人员“溢出”是推动硅谷这样的创新之地发展的关键，甚至比分享具体的技术重要得多。

words.tran_cn: 溢出，溅出；溢出量；摔下；小塞子

trans.tran_cn: 溢出，溢出物，（大城市等容纳不下的）外流人口，始料未及的效果
trans.tran_en: the effect that one situation or problem has on another situation
